ComicInfo.Summary:
“Pantheon Family Reunion” Part 1 of 2. You are cordially invited to the centennial reunion of the Pantheon, the immortal family that influences the course of history. The main talking point? The fate of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Dave Wachter | 1 | Sub | Subscription Cover | Kevin Eastman (a) & Tomi Varga (c) | 2 | RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Cover | Dylan Burnett | 3 | RE | Montreal Comic Con Exclusive Variant Cover | Kevin Eastman | 4 | RE | Yesteryear Comics Exclusive Variant Cover | Photo | 5 | RE | Montreal Canadiens Variant Cover | Kevin Eastman | 6 | *Notes:* The Montreal Comic Con Exclusive Variant Cover is a homage of the Beatles' album cover of Abbey Road.
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-02-03 20:11:10. [Issue ID 604926]
